text.language: Nyo y~mau m~piouwini: ettai/out m~macnou]: a~refai qa pilogoc: pia~,writoc.
You are the Mother of Light, the honored Mother of God, you have carried, the uncircumscript Logos.

language.div: Kau Bunda Sang Terang, Theotokos yang terhormat, engkau t’lah membawa Logos Tanpa Batas.

text.language: أنت يا أم النور المكرمة والدة الاله حملت الكلمة غير المحوى.
Menenca y~remacf: a~reo~hi e~reoi m~paryenoc: qen hanhwc nem hanc~mou: ten[ici m~mo.
After you gave birth to Him, you remained a virgin, with praises and blessings, we magnify you.

language.div: Setelah kau melahirkan Dia, kau tetaplah perawan, dengan pujian dan berkat, kami agungkanmu.

text.language: ومن بعد أن ولدته بقيت عذراء نعظمك بتسابيح وبركات.
Je n~yof qen pefouws: nem p~]ma] m~Pefiwt: nem Pip#n#a# e#y#u#: afi~ afcw] m~mon.
For of His own will, and the pleasure of His Father, and the Holy Spirit, He came and saved us.

language.div: Atas kehendak-Nya sendiri, dan kesenangan Bapa-Nya, dan Roh Kudus, Ia datang dan s’lamatkan kami.

text.language: لأنه بارادته ومسرة أبيه والروح القدس أتى وخلصنا.
Anon hwn tentwbh: eyrensasni eunai: hiten nep~recbia: n~totf m~pimairwmi.
And we too, hope to win mercy, through your intercessions, with the Lover of Mankind.

language.div: Dan kami pun berharap, memenangkan belas kasihan, melalui syafaatmu, bersama Pengasih Umat Manusia.

text.language: ونحن أيضا نطلب أن نفوز برحمة بشفاعاتك لدى محب البشر.
Apic~yoinoufi etcwtp: n~te teparyenia~: afsenaf e~p~swi: sa piy~ronoc m~V~iwt.
The select incense, of your virginity, ascended to the throne, of the Father.

language.div: Dupa pilihan, dari keperawananmu, naik ke takhta Sang Bapa.

text.language: البخور المختار الذى لبتوليتك صعد الى كرسى الآب.
Ehote pic~yoinoufi: n~te ni,eroubim: nem niceravim: Maria ]paryenoc.
Better than the incense, of the cherubim, and the seraphim, O Virgin Mary.

language.div: Lebih baik dari, dupa Kerubim dan Serafim, wahai Perawan Maria.

text.language: أفضل من بخور الشاروبيم والسارافيم يامريم العذراء.
<ere ]ve m~beri: y/e~ta Viwt yamioc: af,ac n~ouman~emton: m~Pefs/ri m~menrit.
Hail to the new heaven, whom the Father has created, and made a place of rest, for His beloved Son.

language.div: Salam bagi surga kedua, yang Bapa t’lah ciptakan dan jadikan, s’bagai tempat perhentian, bagi Putra-Nya yang terkasih.

text.language: السلام للسماء الجديدة التى صنعها الآب وجعلها موضع راحة لابنه الحبيب.
<ere piy~ronoc: m~bacilikon: m~v/e~toufai m~mof: hijen ni,eroubim.
Hail to the royal throne, of Him who is, carried by, the cherubim.

language.div: Salam bagi takhta kerajaan, Dialah yang dibawa, oleh Kerubim.

text.language: السلام للكرسى الملوكى الذى للمحمول على الشاروبيم.
<ere ]p~roctat/c: n~te nen'u,/: n~yo gar a~l/ywc: pe p~sousou m~pengenoc.
Hail to the advocate, of our souls, you are indeed, the pride of our race.

language.div: Salam bagi, pembela jiwa kami, engkaulah sungguh, kebanggaan kami.

text.language: السلام لشفيعة نفوسنا أنت بالحقيقة فخر جنسنا.
Arip~recbeuin e~jwn: w~ y/eymeh n~h~mot: nahren Penc#w#r#: Peno#c# I/#c# P,#c#.
Intercede on our behalf, O full of grace, before our Savior, our Lord Jesus Christ.

language.div: Bersyafaatlah demi kami, hai yang penuh rahmat, di hadapan Jurus’lamat kita, Tuhan kita Yesus Kristus.

text.language: اشفعى فينا ياممتلئة نعمة لدى مخلصنا ربنا يسوع المسيح.
Hopwc n~teftajron: qen pinah] etcoutwn: ouoh n~teferh~mot nan: m~pi,w e~bol n~te nennobi.
That He may confirm us, in the upright faith, and grant us the forgiveness, of our sins.

language.div: Agar Dia teguhkan kami, dalam iman yang lurus, dan berikan kami pengampunan, atas dosa kami.

text.language: لكى يثبتنا فى الايمان المستقيم وينعم لنا بمغفرة خطايانا.
